title: Important COVID-19 Vaccine Information | Venice Family Clinic
description: The latest information from Venice Family Clinic on COVID-19 vaccinations.
cleaned_text: The COVID vaccine is free and available for everyone, regardless of insurance or immigration status. [Click here](https://s3.amazonaws.com/venicefamilyclinic.org/2021/04/Immigrant-Vaxx-flyer-FINAL-English.pdf) or [watch this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aMM3rZqrnzw) for more information. Venice Family Clinic offers bivalent COVID vaccine doses from Pfizer-BioNTech/Comirnaty and Moderna/Spikevax to individuals age 6 months and older. The CDC recommends that everyone age 6 months and older get a bivalent vaccine. Certain people can get an additional bivalent dose. To be eligible, a person must be age 65 and older or moderately to severely immunocompromised. To make an appointment, please click one of the location links below to see what days and times we have available. [4700 INGLEWOOD BLVD, CULVER CITY](https://myturn.ca.gov/screening?config=bf995a9a-1f97-40fa-950f-2356997081f4) [742 WEST GARDENA BLVD., GARDENA](https://myturn.ca.gov/?config=4c2d00b7-df0a-45b8-8516-d9fc966b7123) If you do not have access to a computer or need help, you can call (833) 540-0473 between 8:00 a.m. and 8:30 p.m. You may also call Venice Family Clinic for assistance at
